recipe.title: Scalloped Sweet Potatoes Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; chicken stock, or vegetable stock ; (235 mL)
1 cup ; milk, or milk alternative ; (235 mL)
1 ½ cups ; cheddar cheese, divided ; (150 g)

steps.step: Using a mandolin, slice the sweet potato and add an even layer of slices to a baking dish.
Heat a pan over medium heat then add the olive oil.
Add onion then saute for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic then saute for 1-2 minutes.
Add flour then cook until well combined.
Add the stock then whisk until well combined.
Add the milk, salt, pepper, and half of the thyme.
Whisk until combined then simmer for 1-2 minutes.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Pour half of the cream sauce on top of the potatoes.
Sprinkle the cheddar and parmesan cheeses.
Add an even layer of potato slices on top. Top with the remaining cream sauce and cheddar cheese.
Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20 minutes.
Carefully remove and allow to cool for 5-10 minutes.
Sprinkle with the remaining thyme, if desired and serve.
